screen-one.intro-text: Thanks for coming by! I am a Web developer. My tooling is mostly MEAN stack, but of course not limited to: for this page I mastered React and Next.js :)

screen-two.subtitle: Who am I
screen-two.title: About me
screen-two.desc: I already have more than four years of Web development experience both on FE and BE side, with the strong focus in Angular - by far the best tool for the corporate application development on the FE side. I have been working in teams of various scale, both in start-ups and in large corporate projects. Some of them I have started from scratch.
screen-two.emmi: By the way, please meet my coding partner and arguably the best cat ever - Emmi Mokrianski ðŸ’›
screen-two.name: Pavlo Ivashchenko

screen-three.title: Services provided
screen-three.subtitle: What I do
screen-three.desc: Here listed my main three work directions and the level of my expertise in the fields.
screen-three.service-fe-desc: Able to solve a widest variety of tasks. Pixel-perfect and non-trivial visual solutions` development is what makes me happy.
screen-three.service-app-desc: My current focus is Ionic. So far I have some working experience with Cordova and plan to master React Native.
screen-three.service-be-desc: With my development experience with Node.js I am able to solve medium complexitiy issues, however I have a deeper knowledge in MongoDB.

experience.title: Some of my references
experience.subtitle: resume
experience.desc: My passion is to continually master technologies and related concepts and to apply them with every iteration to my projects. Check out some of the references on that below.

experience.pedagogic-title: Master's degree, English language and literature

quote-4.text: Successfully started not that long ago and so far everything looks great ðŸ˜Ž

quote-3.text: He not only demonstrated a high level of apprehension in all of his assigned tasks, but also managed all projects and tasks with a very high level of responsibility and outstanding expertise.
quote-3.author: Rene Pratsch

quote-2.text: He is able to raise required technology, skill or domain specific knowledge in a very short time. I'm not even speaking about his human quality. He really reliable person and just nice guy!
quote-2.author: Vadim Pospelov

quote-1.text: Working with Pavel at ITREX Group as a tech lead for a project for approximately 2 years I cannot remember any other person with such truly phenomenal persistence, responsibility, and hardworking. I was observing Pavel making tremendous progress in his technical and soft skills every day.
quote-1.author: Oleksandr Buchek
